summary: TAKATA RECALL.  I RECEIVED A FORM REGARDING THE AIRBAG SETTLEMENT.  MY CONCERN IS THAT I AM DRIVING A CAR AROUND WITH A POTENTIALLY DEFECTIVE OR DANGEROUS AIRBAG AND FORD HAS NOT RECALLED MY VEHICLE YET.  I WOULD LIKE SOMEONE TO ASSURE ME THAT MY AUTO SAFETY SYSTEM IS NOT GOING TO ENDANGER ME.
